title: Top 5 Resorts in Goa for Family Holidays
text:
Top 5 Resorts in Goa for Family Holidays Top 5 Resorts in Goa for Family Holidays 0 
The land of Goa is one of the prominent destinations in India, attracts tourists from India and Abroad. This sun kissed place in widely popular for its mesmeric beaches, beautiful churches and late night parties. 
This enchanting destination has a lot to offer. You can delight in picturesque sights, play on the white sands in this exotic region, go boating, water sailing, and paragliding. 
Resorts in Goa are the true places to feel the best with your family, friends and life-partner. All resorts are perfectly designed, offer all luxurious facilities. 
List of Top 5 Resorts in Goa 
1. Park Hyatt Resort 
If you want to have an award winning stay, then go for Park Hyatt Resort in Goa. This resort offers all five star facilities and located on the Arosim Beach. The beach itself is a remarkable tourists spot with pristine and white spotless sands. 
This luxury resort set in a beautiful location with lagoons and waterways inside it. The resort is also home to some of the finest restaurants in this region and offers range of activities including some fitness programs, yoga sessions, spa treatments etc. 
2. Riva Resort 
Riva resort is among the modern resorts with all luxurious services. It is located 50m from Mandrem Beach and has its own spa and open-air restaurant. This resort is a land of swaying palms, white sandy beaches, sparkling waters, and green paddy fields. You will have varieties on food too including sea food, meats and freshly grown vegetables with lots of coconut milk, chilli and spices. 
If you are looking for some tranquility book this resort now. 
3. Ramada Caravela Beach Resort 
The Ramada Caravela beach resort in Goa is located on Varca Beach, offers beautiful waterfront views and is the perfect spot to relax and restore. This resort is artistically designed keeping guests choices in mind, who look for peace and wish to stay away from the hassles of routine life. 
4. Vivanta by Taj 
This is a luxury resort, built on the ramparts of Fort Aguada which was constructed by the Portuguese in the sixteenth century. The resort has an open area where you can play games and organize a get together. Another attractive part of the resort is the fine dining restaurant Latitude. If you are a sea-food lover, Morisco is one of the eatery options in the region. 
5. Resort Rio 
It's a 5 star deluxe luxury spa resort and one of the top resorts in North Goa because of its architecture and hospitality it offers. The resort is very much close to famous Baga Beach and Calangute. The hotel offers several suits and villas. There are 3 dining options for guests- an Italian restaurant, a multi cuisine restaurant and a pure vegetarian Gujarati restaurant. 
Hope you all will like the above mentioned Best Goa Resorts for Christmas, New Year Celebration, Honeymoon, Family Holidays. Book any of them now and relish every single moment of your holiday.
